mapper.sql: id,user_id,category_id, article_title,article_cover,article_content, top_flag,draft_flag,public_flag, hidden_flag,recycle_flag,deleted_flag, commentable_flag,ip_source,ip_address, create_user,create_time,update_user, update_time,publish_user,publish_time
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id,a.user_id,IF(a.category_id=-1,null,a.category_id) category_id, a.article_title,a.article_cover,a.article_content, a.top_flag,a.draft_flag,a.public_flag, a.hidden_flag,a.commentable_flag,atg.tag_id tagIdList FROM tb_article a LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, GROUP_CONCAT(tag_id) tag_id FROM tb_article_tag WHERE deleted_flag = false AND article_id = #{id} GROUP BY article_id) atg ON a.id = atg.article_id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.recycle_flag = false
AND user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a1.id,a1.user_id,a1.article_title, a1.article_cover,a1.public_flag,a1.hidden_flag FROM ( SELECT a.id,a.user_id,a.article_title, a.article_cover,a.public_flag,a.hidden_flag FROM tb_article a
a.draft_flag = false AND a.id < #{id} AND a.user_id = #{bloggerId}
AND a.hidden_flag = false
ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT 1 ) a1 UNION SELECT a2.id,a2.user_id,a2.article_title, a2.article_cover,a2.public_flag,a2.hidden_flag FROM ( SELECT a.id,a.user_id,a.article_title, a.article_cover,a.public_flag,a.hidden_flag FROM tb_article a
a.draft_flag = false AND a.id > #{id} AND a.user_id = #{bloggerId}
AND a.hidden_flag = false
ORDER BY a.id ASC LIMIT 1 ) a2

SELECT a.id,a.user_id,a.article_title, a.article_cover,a.public_flag,a.hidden_flag, a.publish_time FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT article_id FROM ( SELECT tag_id FROM tb_article_tag WHERE article_id = #{id} AND deleted_flag = false ) t LEFT JOIN tb_article_tag ata ON t.tag_id = ata.tag_id AND ata.deleted_flag = false WHERE ata.article_id != #{id} ) t2 LEFT JOIN tb_article a ON t2.article_id = a.id
a.draft_flag = false AND a.user_id = #{bloggerId}
AND a.hidden_flag = false
ORDER BY a.top_flag DESC, a.id DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT a.id,a.user_id,a.category_id, a.article_title,a.article_cover,a.public_flag, a.hidden_flag,a.publish_time,c.category_name, ata.tag tagList FROM tb_article a LEFT JOIN tb_category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(t.id, "=", t.tag_name)) tag FROM tb_article_tag ata LEFT JOIN tb_tag t ON ata.tag_id = t.id WHERE ata.deleted_flag = FALSE AND t.deleted_flag = FALSE GROUP BY article_id) ata ON a.id = ata.article_id
a.category_id = #{condition.categoryId} AND a.draft_flag = false
AND a.hidden_flag = false
ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT #{condition.current}, #{condition.size}

SELECT a.id,a.user_id,a.category_id, a.article_title,a.article_cover,a.public_flag, a.hidden_flag,a.publish_time,c.category_name, ata.tag tagList FROM tb_article a LEFT JOIN tb_category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(t.id, "=", t.tag_name)) tag FROM tb_article_tag ata LEFT JOIN tb_tag t ON ata.tag_id = t.id WHERE ata.deleted_flag = FALSE AND t.deleted_flag = FALSE GROUP BY article_id) ata ON a.id = ata.article_id
a.draft_flag = false AND a.id IN ( SELECT article_id FROM tb_article_tag WHERE tag_id = #{condition.categoryId} )
AND a.hidden_flag = false
ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT #{condition.current}, #{condition.size}
